column1: Kata Robata////Next of course (or of equal consequence should I say) is the sushi cut which in this case is quite generous and commensurate with the price and quality of the shushi as wel as the service which is impeccable
column2: pleasant and not overbearing. Pick you pace and you can be accomodated with both the most pleasant and skillful chefs if you choose the sushi bar (my favorite so you both see and can discuss your meal) or servers who are equally attentive even if you are sitting at the sushi bar.
